text: DAAD may refer to: * The German Academic Exchange Service (German Deutscher Akademischer Austauschdienst) ** DAAD Artists-in-Berlin Program * Direct Action Against Drugs, a cover name for the Provisional Irish Republican Army * Damnation and a Day, a 2003 album by extreme metal band Cradle of Filth * Democratic Alliance Against Dictatorship, a political group in Thailand
title: DAAD
